name: Megadimension Neptunia VIIR
summary: Megadimension Neptunia VIIR is a remake of Megadimension Neptunia VII that features PlayStation VR support. New Virtual Reality events feature the goddesses making memories and spending everyday life with the player in the VR Dimension.

alternative_names.name: Shin Jigen Game Neptune VIIR (Victory II Realize)
新次元ゲイム ネプテューヌVIIR (ビクトリィーツーリアライズ)

esrb.synopsis: This is a role-playing game in which players follow goddesses as they battle evil forces in the fantasy world of Gamindustri. As players explore dungeon-like dimensions, they engage in turn-based battles against monsters (e.g., robots, demons) and other goddesses. Characters use swords, axes, lances, firearms, and energy blasts to deplete enemies' hit points. Combat is highlighted by impact sounds, cries of pain, and occasional gunfire. Some characters wear outfits that reveal large amounts of cleavage and buttocks; some scenes depict characters partially nude with drops of water, steam, or strands of hair barely covering their nipples and genitalia. Dialogue also includes some suggestive material: “I wish to obtain every last figure and magazine of busty blondes, ever!”; "All you did was throw around a bunch of dirty magazines!"; "[H]er chest hasn't developed...She's flat as a board..." The words “sh*t” and “a*shole” appear in dialogue.
